# Baseball

Baseball is currently supported for the following leagues (in alphabetical order):

```{toctree}
:maxdepth: 1

league-baseball-little-league
league-baseball-milb
league-baseball-mlb
league-baseball-ncaa
league-baseball-nfhs
league-baseball-pony-league
```

```{eval-rst}
.. automodule:: sportypy.surfaces.baseball
    :members: BaseballField
```
